meta.name: description
meta.content: Download from here the authentic and quality Facebook (FB) logo in SVG vector or PNG file format.

header.p: Download for free the Facebook (FB) logo in vector (SVG) or PNG file format.

a.title: Download Transparent Facebook (FB) Logo in SVG vector format
Download High Resolution Facebook (FB) Logo symbol in PNG format

div.p: By downloading the Facebook (FB) logo you agree to the Terms of Use.

div.data-alt: Find us on Facebook Blue Facebook (FB) Logo

div.data-alt: Find us on Facebook White Facebook (FB) Logo

img.alt: Find us on Facebook White Facebook (FB) Logo

article.p: Facebook is one of the largest social networking websites, that allows users to post comments, photographs, videos, links, live stream videos, and even order some food. A single place where you can share anything you like with your family and friends, or the entire world.
Mark Zuckerburg along with Edward Saverin started Facebook as a social website for Harvard students. It was open to the public outside the school after 2006, rapidly taking over the world.

Today, Facebook is mostly known as the easiest way to connect with people and businesses all around the world. Offering users a simple and easy to use platform that helps you stay in touch, or build connections around the world.
Facebook allows users to customize their privacy settings, offering users complete control over what they share and who they share it with.
Facebook was founded by Mark Zuckerberg & Edward Saverin in 2004 and is headquartered in Menlo Park, California, United States of America.

div.p: The content of this site is provided on an “as-is” and “as available” basis, and it is intended for non-commercial, informational purposes only, to educate and inform its website visitors about the Facebook logo.

A third party person or company should never use the Facebook logo without the written permission of the copyright and/or trademark holder. For any usage of Facebook logo and brand elements, please contact Facebook directly to request a licensing agreement.

By downloading the Facebook logo from Logo.wine you hereby acknowledge that you agree to these Terms of Use and that the artwork you download could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Logo.wine does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete or current.
The logo images appearing on Logo.wine website are not associated with or sponsored by the copyright and/or trademark holder.
If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@logo.wine
